questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Architecture and buildings
D) Wildlife and animals

Where the photo was taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) In a residential area
D) In front of building

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A building by the water

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) The sky
B) The building
C) The water
D) The people

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A car
C) The entrance of the building
D) A bench

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A mountain range
B) A busy street
C) Trees and foliage
D) An ocean

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A garden
B) The water
C) A playground
D) A statue

What type of windows does the building have?
A) Circular windows
B) Large bay windows
C) Small rectangular windows with shutters
D) Stained glass windows

What color are the window frames?
A) White
B) Black
C) Pinkish-brown
D) Blue

What is located above the entrance of the building?
A) A flag
B) A balcony
C) A light fixture
D) A clock

What can be seen through the entrance of the building?
A) A garden
B) A dining area
C) A table with flowers
D) A staircase

What is the state of the window shutters?  
A) They are closed  
B) They are open  
C) They are missing  
D) They are broken

What is the building's exterior wall color?
A) Bright yellow
B) Light beige
C) Dark grey
D) Brick red

What is placed on the window sills?
A) Bird feeders
B) Flower pots
C) Candles
D) Books

What architectural feature is prominent in the building's roof?
A) A chimney
B) A gabled roof
C) A flat roof
D) A dome

What is the shape of the building's roof?
A) Flat
B) Arched
C) Pitched
D) Dome-shaped

What material is the foundation of the building made of?
A) Wood
B) Metal
C) Brick and stone
D) Glass

What is the color of the roof?
A) Red
B) Green
C) Grey
D) Blue

What is the condition of the plants in the flower pots?
A) Wilted
B) Fresh and blooming
C) Artificial
D) Overgrown

What is the building's relationship to the water?
A) It is floating on the water
B) It is built beside the water
C) It is built over the water
D) It is far away from the water

What is the primary material of the window shutters?
A) Metal
B) Plastic
C) Wood
D) Glass

How many windows are visible in the photo?
A) Two
B) Four
C) Six
D) Eight

What kind of structure is adjacent to the building on the left?
A) A fence
B) Another building
C) A playground
D) A parking lot

What is the color of the flowers in the pot on the left window sill?
A) Red
B) Yellow
C) Purple
D) White

What feature is missing from the building?
A) A front porch
B) A garage
C) A chimney
D) A balcony

What is the most prominent color in the photo?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Beige
D) Green

What is the shape of the windows on the second floor?
A) Circular
B) Square
C) Rectangular
D) Triangular

What is the design of the ironwork on the second-floor windows?
A) Floral patterns
B) Geometric patterns
C) Animal shapes
D) Abstract designs

What can be seen on the roof of the building?
A) Solar panels
B) A weather vane
C) A light fixture
D) A satellite dish

What is the texture of the building's exterior wall?
A) Smooth and polished
B) Rough and textured
C) Covered in tiles
D) Made of glass

What architectural feature is prominent on the building?
A) A large balcony
B) Wooden shutters on the windows
C) A glass facade
D) A stone tower

How many windows are visible on the front of the building?
A) Two
B) Three
C) Four
D) Five
